description:
A decent interface for Invoice Ninja!
Certainly better than the online interface.
It would be good if it were packaged in the Arch repos and as an appimage.
App will no longer run after initial start. I'm not sure if this is a Fedora specific issue or not. I did not look further into the issue as I am using the browser version.
Great, cheap (free for some cases!), extensible invoicing app with reponsive developers, a high level of configuration, and the option to self-host.
